title: Is We Dumb? | Mushrooms. Kegels. Barbie Jeep. Alpha Male.
description:
Have you ever visited an online forum to ask strangers if you could sue a neighbor, who agreed to watch your kid for a couple hours for free, into having to pay child support? WTF?!?! Let's talk about that, a giant ass eagle none of us even knew existed, a waitress saving a little boy from further child abuse, riding janky Barbie Jeeps down rocky hills, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/5GHrPUxuu2c

Show Links:
